attributes.action: Change the rules for drug driving , total unacceptable and inaccurate tests
attributes.additional_details: It’s totally unacceptable and inaccurate , people are scared to be stopped by police just incase they drug drive swob you, they don’t have to show you the so called line that appears on that pen when they swob you, which means they could arrest you without showing you the results , you may not have consumed any thing for days/weeks, But as we know cannabis takes a long time to leave the blood. So you could have consumed loads on Saturday night , not had anything on Sunday but be over on Monday
attributes.background: We want the government to get more accurate tests in regards to this drug driving law, as people are getting banned without being under the influence, which people are losing businesses , families and there own life
